game.name: Adam and Eve Astronaut
game.description:
Your favourite prehistoric Adam has lost in the planet Earth after becoming an astronaut. It seems like he needs your help to spot a motor for his space shuttle. He cannot reach his home back until this task is done. Will help guide him to complete the task in each level for his safe return? Join Adam and Eve Astronaut game and be prepared to help him to interact with the characters and objects nicely to find the way to escape in this brand new arcade game!

Common guys! He is getting difficulty in finding out the missing engine of his spaceship and you are his only hope. Put your logical skills and brainpower to the test to guide this brave caveman to solve the different puzzles in this HTML5 online game! There are multiple items to use in each level. Clear the path for Adam by clicking on them in the correct order! You can expect to have lots of fun and entertainment similar to the previous titles this popular series.

At one time, find a hidden key by opening a door, while the other time, you have to clear the character who is trying to block the path of Adam. Do not forget to click on Adam to see if he is ready to move when you realize that all the obstacles have been cleared away. If he is unable to move, this means that you still have to work on clearing the way from the obstacles. Good luck to have a blast in our free puzzle challenge!
